title: SECURITY-000: Master Security Ticket - BuildNFT Token Platform
description:
## Executive Summary
The BuildNFT.xyz token minting platform has **6 CRITICAL** and **7 HIGH** severity security vulnerabilities that must be fixed before any production deployment. The platform currently has simulated/fake blockchain deployments which constitutes fraud if users are charged real money.
**RECOMMENDATION: DO NOT DEPLOY TO PRODUCTION UNTIL ALL CRITICAL ISSUES ARE RESOLVED**
